title: Pushpa Haaram: Diamond and Gemstone Floral Necklace
features: Intricately designed floral motifs forming a contemporary haaram. Each flower features a cluster of pink rubellite beads at the center, surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. Lavender-blue tanzanite beads are strategically placed to accentuate the flower petals. The necklace is designed for a comfortable and elegant drape. Contemporary design meets traditional haaram feel.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings (vivaha)
description: This exquisite 'Pushpa Haaram' is a stunning blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and contemporary design. The vibrant colors of the rubellite and tanzanite, combined with the dazzling brilliance of the diamonds, create a truly captivating piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster and rich golden hue. A perfect heirloom to treasure for generations.
